channel.title: Queensland Music Festival - Ailan Kores
channel.description:
Thursday Island was to host a spectacular QMF opening event featuring massed community choirs with members drawn from across the Torres Strait in performance with the Queensland Youth Orchestra. My task was to facilitate a vibrant, cohesive culturally appropriate look for the event by providing costume design and styling advice and a documented design framework for local manufacture of costumes.
‘The orchestra loved their costumes! Many of them wore them from the moment we handed them out. I had a thought they might find them a bit old-fashioned but not at all. Alison’s dress was praised for its originality with its plain dress and floral frills. She was the choral director. We had a great party and danced til 2.00am when they threw us out of the Thursday Island Bowls Club’ Erica Hart, Producer
